thread.title: Jeremy Corbyn risks deepening Labour party splits with new role at Campaign for Nuclear Disarmament
thread.title_full: Jeremy Corbyn risks deepening Labour party splits with new role at Campaign for Nuclear Disarmament - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Jeremy Corbyn risks deepening Labour party splits with new role at Campaign for Nuclear Disarmament
text: Jeremy Corbyn has reaffirmed his determination for the Labour party to adopt his long-standing commitment to scrapping Trident by becoming vice-president of the Campaign for Nuclear Disarmament ( CND ). The move risks splitting his shadow
